content:
DSBs facilitate chromosomal translocations generating fusion oncogenes (e.g., BCR-ABL), and single-cell genome sequencing of early lesions can identify such rearrangements before overt neoplasia.  
*Supporting evidence:* DSBs are prerequisite for chromosomal translocations in leukemia [Rowley 2001]. Single-cell sequencing reveals early translocations [Navin 2011, Nature].
